title: NVIDIA Shatters MoE AI Performance Records With a Massive 10x Leap on GB200 ‘Blackwell’ NVL72 Servers, Fueled by Co-Design Breakthroughs
description: Scaling performance on 'Mixture of Experts' AI models is one of the biggest industry constraints, but it appears that NVIDIA has managed to make a breakthrough, credited to co-design performance scaling laws. NVIDIA's GB200 NVL72 AI Cluster Manages to Bring I…
